description:
http://anidb.net/ch55319 [Onoda Sakamichi], a first-year student of Sohoku High School in Chiba, is a bit weak and loves anime. He was going to join the anime research club when he joined high school, but after his encounter with http://anidb.net/ch55320 [Imaizumi Shunsuke], a boy well-renowned in the middle school cycling world, and http://anidb.net/ch55321 [Naruko Shoukichi], a boy who won all the awards in Kansai`s cycling competition, he makes the decision to join the competitive cycling club. Hard training and other incidents wait for him in the Competitive Cycling Club, but unique seniors like http://anidb.net/ch56622 [Kinjou], http://anidb.net/ch56624 [Tadokoro], http://anidb.net/ch56623 [Makishima], and many others support him as overcomes the many trials. Amidst those days of hard work, Sakamichi`s sleeping talent as a road racer begins to awaken!
Source: ANN
Note: The first two episodes were pre-aired at a special event on 29.09.2013, regular TV broadcast started on 08.10.2013.

REGULAR.description:
Onoda Sakamichi, student of Chiba Sohoku Public High School, rides the 90 kilometers back and forth to Akiba on his mommy bike to buy the anime goods he loves. Sakamichi planned to join the anime club in high school and make lots of friends, but without sufficient membership, the anime club had been disbanded. Imaizumi Shunsuke appears before a disappointed Sakamichi with his road racer, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akiba ni Tada de Ikeru kara
Because I Can Go to Akiba for Free
アキバにタダでいけるから

REGULAR.description:
Imaizumi witnesses Sakamichi climbing the high school`s steep rear gate slope on his mommy bike while singing. In order to test his strength, Imaizumi challenges Sakamichi to a bicycle race. Sakamichi is surprised, but hearing Imaizumi`s offer to join the anime club if he loses, Sakamichi accepts the challenge. Kanzaki Miki and her friends hear about the race and look on as Sakamichi and Imaizumi`s rear gate slope bicycle race begins!
Source: crunchyroll

Sakamichi and Imaizumi`s rare gate slope bicycle race has finally begun. Sakamichi pedals as hard as he can so Imaizumi will join the anime club, but is quickly passed by Imaizumi despite his late start. Miki catches up to the disappointed Sakamichi in Toji`s car and adjusts his saddle, and Sakamichi resumes the race. Through his desperate efforts, Sakamichi finally catches up to Imaizumi, but...
Source: crunchyroll

With the rear gate slope race over, the distance between Imaizumi and Sakamichi closes a little. When Sakamichi goes to Akiba on his mommy bike to buy anime goods, he encounters Naruko Shoukichi, a boy with a Kansai accent riding a bike. Naruko becomes enraged when a car throws a cigarette butt at Sakamichi`s mommy bike, and the two begin chasing after the car on their bicycles!
Source: crunchyroll

The day after riding his bike around Akiba with Naruko, Sakamichi encounters Naruko again at his high school`s store. Naruko encourages Sakamichi to join the bicycle racing club with him, but Sakamichi is still unable to abandon the anime club. However, when Sakamichi observes the bicycle racing club training after school at Naruko`s invitation, he experiences a desire to test his own abilities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Souhoku High School Bicycle Racing Team
総北高校自転車競技部

REGULAR.description:
The first years` welcoming race begins. Sakamichi is excited to race with Imaizumi and Naruko again, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Sakamichi acquires the road racer from the van Miki is riding.
Despite it being his first time riding a road racer, Sakamichi rides smoothly and surprises everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakamichi finally catches up to Imaizumi and Naruko. Sakamichi`s surprising growth and earnest feelings ignite their own fighting spirits!
Source: crunchyroll

Encouraged by Naruko, determined to become the King of the Mountain in Minegayama, Sakamichi raises his cadence as high as possible to catch Imaizumi.
Source: crunchyroll

With the welcoming race over and Sakamichi`s potential as a climber discovered, he is told to train with Makishima...
Source: crunchyroll

It is the day after training with Makishima. Sakamichi, Imaizumi, and Naruko thought they had the day off, but the third years were actually participating in a race!
Source: crunchyroll

The Sohoku High bicycle racing club holds a training camp to prepare for the Inter-high.
On their way to the camp ground, as a carsick Sakamichi is taking a break, he encounters cyclist Manami Sangaku.
Source: crunchyroll

The training camp has finally begun. In order to complete Kinjou`s grueling 1000km in four days menu, Imaizumi and Naruko start the morning with great intensity.
Sakamichi follows Makishima`s advice and begins covering more and more ground.
Meanwhile, Inter-high participants from other schools begin steadily preparing for the tournament...!
Source: crunchyroll

The third day of camp. While riding alone early in the morning, Sakamichi is reunited with Manami, the boy he met on the first day of camp. Sakamichi makes a proposal to Manami, but...
Source: crunchyroll

After his meeting with Manami, Sakamichi`s desire to participate in the Inter-high heightens. In order to participate, Sakamichi realizes he must first ride 1,000 kilometers at camp and begins desperately pedaling alongside Inter-high hopefuls Imaizumi and Naruko. However, second years Teshima and Aoyagi had been implementing a certain strategy against the first years...!
Source: crunchyroll

Second years Teshima and Aoyagi stand between the first years and their goal to finish 1,000 kilometers. In order to protect their lead, the second years challenge the first years.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakamichi breaks through Teshima`s impregnable guard on the climb.
With no tricks left, Teshima becomes discouraged, but moved by Aoyagi`s strong will to go to the Inter-high together, he begins chasing the first years again.
Source: crunchyroll

After falling to last place, Sakamichi catches up to Imaizumi, Naruko, Teshima, and Aoyagi. Admist their emotions, the five boys clash in an all out sprint to the finish line!
The battle between the first and second years for the Inter-high finally approaches its climax!
Source: crunchyroll

Having completed the difficult training camp, Sakamichi has grown, but with so much less experience and strength than the other members, be gives up on partipating in the Inter-high...
Source: crunchyroll

The Sohoku High bicycle racing club`s fighting spirits rise with the upcoming Inter-high.
Meanwhile, at the previous year`s winner, Hakone Academy, climbers second year Kuroda and first year Manami were racing for a spot in the Inter-high.
Source: crunchyroll

The day before the Inter-high, Kinjou recalls the events of the previous summer`s Inter-hiigh. Kinjou`s one-on-one battle with Hakone Academy`s ace concludes with...
Source: crunchyroll

Sakamichi and the team arrive at Enoshima, the starting location of the Inter-high.
Nervous about his first race, Sakamichi can`t hide his anxiety, but he becomes fired up upon hearing the encouragement of his teammates.
Source: crunchyroll

The first day of the Inter-high begins. Sakamichi begins riding with the goal of finishing with Imaizumi and Naruko. As they enter the flats, every school`s sprinter begins moving...
Source: crunchyroll

Every school`s top sprinters begin racing at once to take the first checkpoint.
Pursuing leaders Tadokoro and Naruko is a man who trained his body to perfection for this day, Hakone Academy`s Izumida.
Seeing how they defy his sprinting theory, Izumida calls them failures at sprinting.
Source: crunchyroll

Tadokoro and Naruko catch up to Izumida with their special techniques.
Witnessing their unexpected strength, Izumida revokes his judgment of calling them failures.
Source: crunchyroll

The first checkpoint comes down to a three-man battle. Tadokoro and Naruko fearlessly charge towards the finish line!
The battle is ultimately decided by their determination to win, and the race enters the mountain stage.
Source: crunchyroll

When Sakamichi gets wrapped up in a fall and ends up in last place, Makishima takes over leading the team through the mountain stage.
Hakone Academy`s Toudou appears, and...
Source: crunchyroll

Believing Sakamichi will catch up to the team, Makishima decides to wait three minutes.
Meanwhile, now in last place, Sakamichi begins riding as hard as he can for team Sohoku riding in the lead.
Told to pass 100 riders by Teshima, Sakamichi catches up with his astoundingly high cadence!
However, Kyoto Fushimi`s Midousuji stands in his way.
Source: crunchyroll

With Sakamichi caught up to the team, Makishima chases after his rival, Hakone Academy`s Toudou. Their showdown has finally begun! Passing the 100th man Midousuji, Sakamichi catches up to the Sohoku team with his surging climb.
Source: crunchyroll

4 kilometers to the finish line. As each school`s ace begins riding to win the first day, Sohoku`s ace Kinjou and Imaizumi aim for the finish line with the team`s hopes on their shoulders. Imaizumi drafts for Kinjou with all his might, but Hakone Academy`s ace assistance Arakita approaches the duo like a beast.
Source: crunchyroll

Just before the finish line, Midousuji strikes at a moment`s opening and astoundingly closes on the aces. In order to protect his ace, Imaizumi chases after him with his legs approaching their limit, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Fukutomi, Kinjou, and Midousuji`s three way battle ends in a three way tie after the first day of the Inter-High. As the winners of each section`s checkpoint are celebrated, Tadokoro falls ill and collapses on the ground. Amidst a disquieted atmosphere, Team Sohoku heads to their lodgings.
Source: crunchyroll

The longest stage of the three day race begins on the second day of the Inter-High.
With his order to climb the pass and catch up to Kinjou and Imaizumi with the whole team in two in his heart, Sakamichi begins riding.
However, having fallen ill the previous day, Tadokoro stands alone at the starting line unable to move...!
Source: crunchyroll

Team Sohoku`s members are separated. The champions Hakone Academy and Midousuji`s Kyoto Fushimi sprint ahead, leaving a panicked Imaizumi and Kinjou behind...
Source: crunchyroll

Though Makishima and Naruko meet up with the grouop, Sohoku remains at a disadvantage. However, knowing Sakamichi and Tadokoro are catching up from behind, they begin pursuing the teams in the lead once again.
Source: crunchyroll

100 meters to the sprint checkpoint. In his battle against Midousuji, Shinkai awakens as Hakone`s straight line demon and rides faster than ever. In the face of such overwhelming power, Midousuji removes the tape on his thighs and rides at full power.
Source: crunchyroll

With Sakamichi and Tadokoro caught up, team Sohoku finally has all six members. As though pulled along by Sakamichi`s efforts, Imaizumi and Naruko begin riding with their hearts as one.
Source: crunchyroll

The race seems to be going according to Kyoto Fushimi Midousuji`s plan, but Hakone Academy regains their pace through their powerful trust.
A certain team is catching up to the team leading schools!
Source: crunchyroll

1465.name: timid -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED
